item.title: Experience the passion and joy of BMW at the BMW World in Singapore
item.description:
BMW Group Asia is hosting BMW World of Passion and Joy at the Suntec Singapore International Convention and Exhibition Centre on August 25th and 26th, 2018. This event offers visitors a chance to experience the latest BMW and MINI models, explore classic BMW heritage cars, and immerse themselves in The MINI Story. Performances and interactive activities will be available throughout the event. Christopher Wehner, Managing Director of BMW Group Asia, emphasized that the event bridges BMW’s past, present, and future...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/experience-the-passion-and-joy-of-bmw-at-the-bmw-world-in-singapore/

item.title: Singapore has seen the launch of four new BMW models
item.description:
BMW Group Asia is launching four new car models simultaneously for the first time in Singapore. The First-Ever BMW i8 Roadster The BMW i8 Roadster features upward-opening doors. This groundbreaking convertible plug-in hybrid, dubbed a “gentleman’s racer,” can accelerate from 0 to 100 km/h in 4.6 seconds. CS Liew, a director at an agricultural science company, owns the first edition in Singapore, which is already on the road. Initially preferring hardtop convertibles, Liew was captivated by the i8 Roadster’s design...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/singapore-has-seen-the-launch-of-four-new-bmw-models/
